subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: McIlroy, who had been answering questions about winning the tournament to complete a career Grand Slam, is 12 strokes behind the 36-hole leader, Jordan Spieth.
snippet: McIlroy, who had been answering questions about winning the tournament to complete a career Grand Slam, is 12 strokes behind the 36-hole leader, Jordan Spieth.
